StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetWaiverByCategoryTypeAndLevelCodes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@Category char(1) ,@Type char(1) ,@Level char(1))
AS
SELECT w.[WAIVER_ID] ,w.[EFFECTIVE_DATE] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE] ,wc.[WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_ID] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_CODE] ,wt.[WAIVER_TYPE_DESC] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_ID] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE] ,wl.[WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC] FROM [dbo].[WAIVER] w WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_CATEGORY] wc ON wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE = @Category AND w.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = wc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_TYPE] wt ON wt.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE = @Type AND w.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = wt.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_LEVEL] wl ON wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE = @Level AND w.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID
